title: Rating reminder
text: send an email reminding me to rate a property a week after purchase/rent

title: Property update notifications
text: Send an email when a property I've purhcased/rented is updated

title: Property comment notification
text: Send me an email when someone comments on my property

title: property comment notifications
text: Send me an email when someone comments on one of my properties

title: Property verification notifications
text: Send me an email when my listed property gets verified

title: Buyer review notifications
text: send an email when my property is purhcased

title: Monthly summary emails
text: Send me a monthly summary of all my verified properties statistics
